title: of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 245 of 2011) an d the
heading: 3. The Employment Regulation Order (English Language Schools Joint
text_raw:
3. The Employment Regulation Order (English Language Schools Joint 
Labour Committee Establishment Order) 2019 (S.I. No. 593 of 2019) is 
revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th February, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [42] 3 

The Sector

title: of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 245 of 2011) an d the
heading: The sector comprises: English Language Schools in the Republic of Ireland
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

The sector comprises: English Language Schools in the Republic of Ireland 
which provide education and training in English as a foreign language and 
other English language related training courses. 

Workers in the Sector to Whom the Order Applies 

Academic, administrative, maintenance, cleaning and security staff. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
11 February, 2020. 

PAT BREEN, 

Minister of State at the Department of Business, Enterprise 

and Innovation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [42]

title: of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 245 of 2011) an d the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purpose to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purpose to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order gives effect to the Labour Court recommendation to establish an 
English Language Schools Joint Labour Committee pursuant to Section 39 of 
the Industrial Relations Act 1946 as amended. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [42] 5
